entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Fog patches developing before morning. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High plus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h in the afternoon. High plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of rain mixed with snow. Temperature steady near plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers early in the evening. Periods of rain mixed with snow beginning late in the evening. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Wind becoming southeast 20 gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 near the Strait of Georgia overnight. Temperature steady near plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Tuesday 28 February 2023
